extendedInfo.description: "âSpeech by the king of Sparta!The tyrannical king of Persia, Xerxes, has amassed his dark legions against Greece! It is our solemn duty to defend Greece and dispatch his minions to Hades. We will make our stand at Thermopylae, where we will engrave in eternity the bravery and name of SPARTA!âFeatures30 levels13 Spartan types (4 historic hero characters)30 Persian types12 skills (12 active, 4 passive)RPG style level-up systemFantasy history gameAutomatic hack & slashCombination of strategy + defenseEstablishment of your own camp with strategic flagsâMeet historic heroes!Hero Agesilaus- King who tried to free many Greek cities from the clutches of Persia. He shoots arrows with powerful fire.Hero Gylippus - General who thwarted the Athenian plan to conquer Sicily. He has the ability to heal heroes and soldiers around him.Hero Brasidas- Hero of the Peloponnesian War who is compared to Hercules in the Symposium by Plato. Using his tremendous Health as a weapon, he provokes enemies to attack him.Hero Pausanias- Spartan supreme commander for the allied powers that destroyed the Persian military. With powerful attacks and health, he significantly increases the attack power of allies by raising their morale."ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Other fun and exciting games are available, too!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSTips and Updateswww.com2us.com

reviews.title: I really like the game but it won\'t save anymore
reviews.comment: I played the game for a bit then bought a hero and now it let\'s me play for a while but when I stop and play again all of my progress is gone. This game is great except for that one flaw
reviews.author: Jamael Smith

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Firstly I enjoy play this game.. But something strange occured, when I play in stage 26.. There is an invisible enemy, I can\'t hit the enemy.. Please fix it, and I give you 5 stars
reviews.author: Robby Widyahartono

reviews.title: Bought a hero and reset
reviews.comment: I got about halfway threw game and decided to buy a hero.  Games worth couple bucks right?  Well next day reset and i was on tutorial lvl. I still had my hero. I will play again when they fix this.game wont save now.
reviews.author: James Howie

reviews.title: Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Seems like dota warcraft nice play , good game , funny character and posibble to play not to hard not to easy , Good Game
reviews.author: Albert Tambuwun

reviews.title: Pros and CONS
reviews.comment: Its a good game only reason I give it a low rating is because I bought gold coins twice and my coins never went thru to the game talk about a total disappointment uninstall. I don\'t recommend buying coins it doesn\'t even go thru.
reviews.author: angel refuerzo

reviews.title: Lost all my gold and heroes
reviews.comment: I paid real money for gold and heroes, and the very next day the game resetted and I lost them all. What in the world is this? I expect a resolution ASAP.  Edit: 1 week after I emailed the devs, and still no response. This is thievery.
reviews.author: Haoyong Lee

reviews.title: Money into hero.. down the drain
reviews.comment: I ended up in investing 25 dollars into my character then all the sudden the whole system reset out of nowhere and I\'m back at level 1. Bull S....
reviews.author: Cj Warmolts

reviews.comment: Load of crap brought a hero and some gold and yhe poxy game reset avoid\tAvoid money grabbin toot

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: As always COM2US nice game u guys just make the perfect games huge fan of ur games. Keep up the good work

reviews.title: Nice and fun
reviews.comment: Nice and fun game. Was looking for there type of game and found it. Not hard and complicated fun and enjoying. Thanks
reviews.author: Fujihiro JLF

reviews.title: Stupid app
reviews.comment: I lost a lot of my money to buy that fuckin coin in this game of yours..but then i cannot recall my game saved.. Gimme back my money !!!

reviews.title: Rate
reviews.comment: Awesome .I hop can put more troop and more level.thank you.

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I just downloaded and im having fun right now good navagation easy to play

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: It is a great game once you start understanding the technique and really start building your army

reviews.title: Greaaaat!!
reviews.comment: Easy to enjoy. Also kool objects on battlefield. An most of all best control movement then any other game even when the screen is full with enemies.

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: This is an amazing game, and if you like hacking though hordes of monsters as much as I do give it a try! 5 stars
reviews.author: Yaseen Traylor

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Won\'t save the game anymore, won\'t let me log in anymore , even paid in game, waste of money.
reviews.author: Chris H

reviews.title: Good game!
reviews.comment: I like it, I think it would be better to button bash the baddies instead of tap them. Adding a D-pad for movement and attacking would be nice, even if its just as an option in the menu.
reviews.author: James Pstterson

reviews.title: Cool but hard?
reviews.comment: I got bored on stage15 .. when I got a 1 lose .. I unistall it .. but this game is cool ..
reviews.author: Miguel Palwa

reviews.title: A good action defense game
reviews.comment: Polished with allotsa interesting contents Kinda sluggish though for a 2d game 4 star for the sluggish feelings
